column4: hi.. there's hundreds of ' Launching Wallet Server ' on panel and it's slowing down my pc. http://imagebin.org/74291
hmm wallet server.. not sure... but in xchat prefs you should set "auto accept file transfer" to no because sometimes idiots on IRC try to send you files repeatedly
and you get 100 windows like that
: no it's not file transfer it's happen when i open kde apps.
